steps.name: [UI - Navigation] Navigate to the URL and maximize the browser window
[UI - Button] Clicking button with componentType: BOOTSTRAP_INPUT_TYPE, locator: By.id: signin_button
[UI - Input] Insert value 'username' into input element: USERNAME_FIELD
[UI - Input] Insert value 'password' into input element: PASSWORD_FIELD
[UI - Button] Clicking button with componentType: BOOTSTRAP_INPUT_TYPE, locator: By.cssSelector: input[value='Sign in']
[UI - Navigation] Navigate back in the browser history
[UI - Link] Clicking on the link element: TRANSFER_FUNDS_LINK
[UI - Select] Selecting option in dropdown: TF_FROM_ACCOUNT_DDL (Value: Credit Card(Avail. balance = $ -265))
